Title: It's Done
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Raphael Jackson Jr., Damione Macedon, Safia Dirie (executive story editor), Jeff Dix (story editor), Monica Mitchell (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Ghost teams up with Tommy to clean up the gang-infested location of his business; Tommy's organization begins to destabilize; Tariq turns to some old friends.
